nodes.documentation: Example script for the Ethereum development walkthrough
nodes.name: Wrestling

nodes.documentation: The logs that will be emitted in every step of the contract's life cycle
nodes.name: WrestlingStartsEvent

nodes.documentation: A second wrestler can register as an opponent
nodes.name: registerAsAnOpponent

nodes.documentation:
Every round a player can put a sum of ether, if one of the player put in twice or 
more the money (in total) than the other did, the first wins
nodes.name: wrestle

nodes.documentation:
The withdraw function, following the withdraw pattern shown and explained here: 
http://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/develop/common-patterns.html#withdrawal-from-contracts
nodes.name: withdraw
